item.title: Restaurant Manager
item.description: Restaurant Manager for a Computer Science project @uniroma1. Table of contents Introduction Features Languages used Setup Supported Operating Systems Introduction Features Create and manage an offline menu which is saved locally and can be accessed after multiple executions of the software. Different sections of the GUI for every worker in the Restaurant including Chef, Cook, Server and Cashier. Create, modify and delete dishes from every order. Export an order’s receipt as a .
